body_html:
Hi,
Recently I tried to check tensorflow with : python -m tensorflow.models.image.mnist.convolutional.
And I get same error:

(tensorflowGPU)administrator@zsp515-6a:/home$ python -m tensorflow.models.image.mnist.convolutional
I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:105] successfully opened CUDA library libcublas.so locally
I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:105] successfully opened CUDA library libcudnn.so locally
I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:105] successfully opened CUDA library libcufft.so locally
I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:105] successfully opened CUDA library libcuda.so.1 locally
I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:105] successfully opened CUDA library libcurand.so locally
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/usr/lib/python2.7/runpy.py", line 162, in _run_module_as_main
"main", fname, loader, pkg_name)
File "/usr/lib/python2.7/runpy.py", line 72, in _run_code
exec code in run_globals
File "/home/administrator/tensorflowGPU/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py", line 316, in
tf.app.run()
File "/home/administrator/tensorflowGPU/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py", line 30, in run
sys.exit(main(sys.argv))
File "/home/administrator/tensorflowGPU/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py", line 122, in main
train_data_filename = maybe_download('train-images-idx3-ubyte.gz')
File "/home/administrator/tensorflowGPU/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py", line 57, in maybe_download
tf.gfile.MakeDirs(WORK_DIRECTORY)
File "/home/administrator/tensorflowGPU/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/platform/gfile.py", line 294, in MakeDirs
os.makedirs(path, mode)
File "/home/administrator/tensorflowGPU/lib/python2.7/os.py", line 157, in makedirs
mkdir(name, mode)
OSError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: 'data'

What name of the folder ,current working directory, in this/my case?﻿
Thanks.

Hi,
Recently I tried to check tensorflow with : python -m tensorflow.models.image.mnist.convolutional.
And I get same error:
(tensorflowGPU)administrator@zsp515-6a:/home$ python -m tensorflow.models.image.mnist.convolutional
I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:105] successfully opened CUDA library libcublas.so locally

"main", fname, loader, pkg_name)

exec code in run_globals

What name of the folder ,current working directory, in this/my case?﻿
Thanks.
body:
Hi,
Recently I tried to check tensorflow with : python -m tensorflow.models.image.mnist.convolutional.
And I get same error:

(tensorflowGPU)administrator@zsp515-6a:/home$ python -m tensorflow.models.image.mnist.convolutional
I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:105] successfully opened CUDA library libcublas.so locally
I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:105] successfully opened CUDA library libcudnn.so locally
I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:105] successfully opened CUDA library libcufft.so locally
I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:105] successfully opened CUDA library libcuda.so.1 locally
I tensorflow/stream_executor/dso_loader.cc:105] successfully opened CUDA library libcurand.so locally
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/runpy.py", line 162, in _run_module_as_main
    "__main__", fname, loader, pkg_name)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/runpy.py", line 72, in _run_code
    exec code in run_globals
  File "/home/administrator/tensorflowGPU/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py", line 316, in <module>
    tf.app.run()
  File "/home/administrator/tensorflowGPU/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/platform/app.py", line 30, in run
    sys.exit(main(sys.argv))
  File "/home/administrator/tensorflowGPU/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py", line 122, in main
    train_data_filename = maybe_download('train-images-idx3-ubyte.gz')
  File "/home/administrator/tensorflowGPU/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/models/image/mnist/convolutional.py", line 57, in maybe_download
    tf.gfile.MakeDirs(WORK_DIRECTORY)
  File "/home/administrator/tensorflowGPU/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/python/platform/gfile.py", line 294, in MakeDirs
    os.makedirs(path, mode)
  File "/home/administrator/tensorflowGPU/lib/python2.7/os.py", line 157, in makedirs
    mkdir(name, mode)
**OSError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: 'data'**

What name of the folder ,current working directory, in this/my case?﻿
Thanks.
